mapper.select: SELECT A.EVAL_ID , A.EVAL_TTL , A.CENT_ID , A.MEM_ID , A.WRI_ID , A.CREATED_AT , A.UPDATED_AT FROM TB_EVALUATION A WHERE A.ACTIVE = TRUE ORDER BY A.CREATED_AT DESC OFFSET #{pageable.offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageable.pageSize} ROWS ONLY;

SELECT A.EVAL_ID , A.EVAL_TTL , A.CENT_ID , A.MEM_ID , A.WRI_ID , A.CREATED_AT , A.UPDATED_AT FROM TB_EVALUATION A WHERE A.CENT_ID = #{centerId} AND A.ACTIVE = TRUE ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT A.EVAL_ID , A.EVAL_TTL , A.EVAL_CONT , A.CENT_ID , A.MEM_ID , A.WRI_ID , A.CREATED_AT , A.UPDATED_AT FROM TB_EVALUATION A WHERE A.EVAL_ID = #{id} AND A.ACTIVE = TRUE
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM TB_EVALUATION A WHERE A.ACTIVE = TRUE
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM TB_EVALUATION A WHERE A.CENT_ID = #{centerId} AND A.ACTIVE = TRUE;
